column5: Check out todays satellite picture of Lake Simcoe. This may be the biggest crack in the ice I have ever seen. You know its big when you see it from orbit!!!

first I thought that your wife or plumber would be mad at you...LOL then I saw the map I had downloaded it and supersized it to see it better and it seems to me it's about the path of the big pressure crack that shows up every year
Open fishing, I see a trolling route
Sitting at my desk in Toronto, I can now hear the phones in Scarborough ringing off the hook about the new 'drive to' hot spots on Simoce.
A few people drive their trucks into that every winter.
I thought you were talking about something of this sort http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Os1TiRd8bsI
Are ya in yet... wiggle your ears!
WOW...i hope everone who is going that way with a 4-wheeler or snow machine is made aware of that man thats huge !!!!!!
